resources.string: Dj sounds are creating the extreme noise pollution.It has distratded the diffrent human activity ,reduce the concenrtation of people on work.some of its content are not easily digested by the society in which we livw. Realizing this fact, Government has taken action to ban the DJ sound in the area of municipality.anyone breaching this Would be heavily penalised according to the law.

Municipality has launched the vaccination program for the goat free of cost.The vetinary doctor will be available to your days within fewdays. So ,all the concerned authority are requested to coordinate and assist this program and make this campagain sucessful.

Government as always , is in the favoue of making the service delivery easier,feasible and compatible with citizens need. So, realizing the disablity of the elderely citizen , government has started the delivery of bridda bhatta in the home of citizen .As well as there will be health checkup in that time. So, be alert and informed about it.
